abstract: The first stage of the three-part renovation of Madison Square Garden included new concourse areas and some improvements few fans will see.
snippet: The first stage of the three-part renovation of Madison Square Garden included new concourse areas and some improvements few fans will see.
lead_paragraph: The oddest part of seeing the first part of the three-part renovation of Madison Square Garden is traveling from the familiar lobby (which will not be done until Year 3), up the same old escalators (untouched until at least next year) and through the doors into the new main concourse, and feeling as if you've stepped into another building entirely.

headline.main: Touring the Renovated Madison Square Garden (to Be Continued)
